outline:
1. to stop up, shut up, keep close
    1. (Qal)
      1. to stop up
      2. to shut up, keep close
      3. secret (participle)
    2. (Niphal) to be stopped up
    3. (Piel) to stop up
kjv_def: closed up, hidden, secret, shut out (up), stop.
strongs_def: to stop up; by implication, to repair; figuratively, to keep secret
